main event: A bright object was sighted over Prescott, Arizona, displaying reddish light and oscillating movement.
interesting points: The object was observed for 35 to 45 seconds,It appeared as a bright star slowly dropping in the sky,It moved silently and at a great rate of speed,It possibly measured the size of a conventional aircraft,The object moved through 30 degrees in altitude and azimuth.
sighted object: a bright object with reddish light
